ca.uqac.lif.cep.peg.ml

Class RunningVariance

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.cep.Processor
      • ca.uqac.lif.cep.GroupProcessor
        • ca.uqac.lif.cep.peg.ml.RunningVariance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ca.uqac.lif.cep.Contextualizable, ca.uqac.lif.cep.Duplicable, ca.uqac.lif.cep.DuplicableProcessor

    public class RunningVariance
extends ca.uqac.lif.cep.GroupProcessor

    Processor computing the running variance of a stream of numbers. This is implemented as a group processor, that computes E[X]2 - E[X2], where E[X] are instances of the StatMoment processor.
